Title: Papers? Please!
Description:
Hey pal, what's it gonna take to get you to leave me alone? 

How about a trip? A POWER trip...

I told Boss Sparkshot that I would man the worksite's...er, resort's! Yeah, that I would man the resort's front desk for a bit.

Care to take my place? It's just your usual paper-pushing busy work. Check credentials, keep an eye out for corporate sabotage, call in the occasional air strike, etcetera, etcetera...

<Garv has already fallen back asleep.>
ObjectivesText: Перевірте документи на столику наглядача у Пункті нагод.
RewardText: <Ґарв кидає щось в тебе, навіть не підводячи погляду.>
